```{r}

groups2<- groups1%>%
  filter(Tax_Group ==2)


Counties<-rep(c(county),c(20))
wastePer <-groups2$WTE_Landfill_Percentage
waste1 <- data.frame(Counties, wastePer)
waste1
model2<-aov(wastePer~Counties, data=waste1 )
summary(model2)
TukeyHSD(model2)
```

```{r}
groups2<- groups2%>%
  group_by(County)

View(groups2)
waste1<-scale(groups2[,c("WTE_Landfill_Percentage","Onsite_Percentage")])
fviz_nbclust(waste1, kmeans, method = "wss")
model4<- kmeans(waste1, centers =3 , nstart = 260)
fviz_cluster(model4, waste1)

model4$cluster
```
